name: Deadmaggedon
description:
You hear a siren and then on the TV there's an EAS telling about an incoming atomic bomb detonation, you get yourself in the car and hide in a bunker but when you come out some time later a zombie approaches...

Deadmaggedon is a simple infinite shooter game, kill zombies, Upgrade your arsenal and yourself and maybe you'll escape the hoarde!

If you see any bugs send me an email
studioorangefeedback@gmail.com
